name: Kait
review: Haven't used another lipstick or lip color since I stumbled on these! I have 6 shades: Cherish, Darling, Honey, Charm, Rendezvous, and Precious, but don't plan on buying the others because dark/deep lip colors don't look good against my blue eyes, fair freckly skin and blonde hair. I use these whenever I leave my house and even sometimes when I don't. They're so moisturizing and glide on like a lip balm; I forget that I'm even wearing them! The tingling and minty scent dissipate about 3 minutes after application so if you don't like that in a lip product, don't let it deter you from these! The color stays on all day (and sometimes all night!) but when it does fade, it doesn't get splotchy or fade faster in some places than others. They're glossy right after application, but the glossiness wears away and becomes matte when your lips are completely stained (1-2 hours after). The color stays completely even and has never dried out my lips, unlike other lip stains I've tried in the past. If you do find them to be a little drying, you could always put a little gloss or lip balm over it throughout the day. Out of the ones I have, all are "true to tube color" but some fade to lighter colors than they were initially after about 6-7 hours of wear. The product itself (especially Honey) looks a lot darker than the tube, but it doesn't go on that dark.

name: e
review:
Honestly my favorite lip product - I'll never be able to go back to any other, simply because I've become spoiled on not having to worry about touching up throughout the day. It isn't particularly hydrating, but I usually wear regular lip balm underneath anyway.
Honey: I use this color pretty much everyday. "My lips but better" pink, though when it gets to the "stain" part, it becomes brighter and more noticeable than when you first apply. If you want a true nude that stays nude, go with Charm. I touch up Honey about once or twice a day, because it tends to fade unevenly, highlighting any weird lines or dry spots on lips.
Rendezvous: Red, but a bright red rather than a deep one. Goes on more matte than Honey, but I think as you build it up, it becomes glossier. This has amazing staying power. If I put it on before a night out, my lips will still be pleasantly red (but very natural-looking!) the morning after. It fades evenly and I almost never have to touch up.
Honey seems to be more glossy than Rendezvous, but I think that's just because I've used it more often. As the point of the crayon goes down, the product becomes "slicker" and less matte on the lips.
It does have a faint minty smell, which I know some people hate, and it's not as sweet as some minty lip balms - smells a little mediciney or floss-like, to be honest. But it's really not that noticeable.
If you're on the fence about springing for this product, I'd say just go for it. Everyone I know unanimously loves it!

review: I have fair skin, with red and golden undertones. "Romantic" works great on me - it's a bright red that doesn't look clownish or over the top. Instead, it's fresh and pretty and can bring a lot to a dark or neutral work look. It has a subtle minty taste that is not intrusive. It lasts well, but I wouldn't say it's truly an all-day stain. It's more like a balm that gives you some moisture, that lasts pretty well for a balm. One thing I don't love is that this "pencil" cannot be sharpened. Strange way to deliver this product, but it's lasted longer than I would have expected, and this will not keep me from buying it again. Recommended!

review:
I'm going to write a lengthy review about this product, just because it surprised me even though I'd done much research on it before purchasing.
I bought this in the shade Honey because I'd heard it was the most natural color of the line, and I love love love this product.

It smells a bit like a candy cane, but the fragrance is not strong at all, not compared to other products like Tarte Lipsurgence and C.O. Bigelow lip glosses. You can smell it on the crayon, but not on your lips.

Unfortunately, you don't get a lot of product; you get about an inch and a half, but I think it'll be fine because it's long-lasting and doesn't need to be reapplied often. The texture is so smooth, and the color payoff is pigmented, but not opaque. At first, your lips will have a hint of shine and WILL not be stained yet, so I advise you to put this balm stain on at least a half hour before you eat, drink, kiss, etc because it will come off like a normal lipstick. The staying power kicks in once the balm is gone and it feels like your lips are bare. Also, be SURE to exfoliate and moisturize your lips prior to using this. The worst thing you can do is apply this to chapped, flaky lips. My lips were slightly chapped, leaving unsightly bits of skin on the crayon. Don't be surprised if this is not extremely moisturizing. Buy it for the color, not the balm. It is, however, much easier on the lips than most lip stains, especially those marker stains.

Don't judge a book by its cover. In other words, don't judge these babies by their packaging or even the color of the crayon stick. I noticed that the shade I bought, Honey, changes color over time. This might not apply to the other colors, but it did to this one. When I first put on the balm stain, the color appeared like the color of the crayon, only slightly more pink. When the balm faded, my lips were left with a different, even pinker, bright color. It looked like the color of the packaging of Sweetheart as shown on this website. I'm fine with bright colors so I was okay with it, but it was surprising because I thought it was supposed to be the most natural, universally flattering shade of the bunch, but here I was with a bright pink on my lips. I then reapplied the balm on my lips again, and a different color appeared, a berry pink. Later, it returned to the bright pink. If you're looking for a natural color, Honey is not your best bet, surprisingly.

What I love about this product the most is how long and well it lasts. I went about my day normally, licking my lips, eating, talking, and the color stayed and was even. It wasn't 100 smudge-proof, but I was very satisfied. I wear this every day and plan on getting more colors in the future. Whoohoo!

I didn't notice anything drying or irritating about the balm stain.

The tubes are kind of intimidating vibrant colors and at first I was not sure which would suit me; keep in mind the colors go on as sheer versions of what the tube looks like. So shades I wouldn't think I look good in work because they aren't super saturated. They also don't seem to stain at first, but they do. The color lasted longer than a standard tinted balm. I bought two ("honey" a soft neutral shade that would enhance anyones natural lip color- good for an everyday look and "Adore" which is a nice somewhat brown red that is pretty and not overwhelming) but if I was not limited by practicality, I may have gotten more.

name: Bruins fan
review:
Goes on smooth, and it lasts... Love the colors, though not true to color on endcap.
I would certainly recommend this product.

name: mae
review: the staying power is really good, and will not dry out your lips. compare to some high end lip product, this lip stain/balm is really awesome!i have 4 other colors and all are great.

name: MichyMakeup
review: I've purchased 5 of these balm stains which should say how much I love them!  Revlon really outdid themselves.  I like these even more than the lip butters. Long lasting color, buildable, fun and easy to apply.  My only complaint is that if you have dry lips then you'll want to moisturize and remove any flakiness first. The balm stains can emphasize the flakes and doesn't really do much to moisturize dry lips on it's own.  On healthy lips though it's perfect!

name: karit0l
review: I LITERALLY USE THIS EVERYDAY! i got the orangy color and it is so beautiful!!! LOVE IT

name: jlhulbe
review: Good. I got the color romantic and I like it, until it starts to wear off. It can be patchy in the fading process, but the color is beautiful.

name: livinggeekchic
review: I love this balm lip stain! I have previously used regular lip stains, but felt they were drying. This does not dry my lips out at all. I absolutely love that I can put this on and it will STAY on all morning and into the afternoon too. When you first put it on, the color is very vibrant and a little glossy. I bought this is smitten and it looks dark. But after a little while, the glossiness wears out, and you are left with a beautiful berry color on your lips. I would definitely recommend these--perfect for everyday wear at the office when I want a color but don't have time to worry about reapplying throughout the day. My only negative--I wish they had a larger color selection.

name: Sarah
review: It adds the perfect amount of color! I use it during the day to add that splash of color with out the sticky mess most lipsticks give you.

name: Mom with Just a Touch of Glam
review: Overall a great lip product.  One application lasts me about 4 hours.  Great color, but looks dry without lip gloss over it.

name: likealady26
review: Long lasting, beautifil color....love it!

name: NuTru
review: I apply the balm-stain early in the morning and I am not concerned about my lips for the rest of the day! It is great. The colors are similar but I plan on purchasing all colors! One thing I can recommend if you like a gloss/shine, carry a lip balm or gloss to apply later during the day. Don't be concerned with the color, trust-the stain will hold strong :)

name: GreenGirl
review: I was hoping this product would be a convenient and moisturizing lip stain to replace my usual liner, stain, and gloss routine. Unfortunately it fell short on every point. It's basically tinted chapstick. The color selection is terrible to begin with but the ACTUAL color is nothing like the product packaging or even like the product itself when it's applied to your lips. There is no "stain" but just tinted balm. It wears off faster than most basic lipsticks so there is no "ColorStay" about it. And for nearly $10, this is a complete waste of money. I returned it.

name: roryg
review: A bit dry for my taste, but good overall

name: mel
review: love this!!

name: Rose
review: Not messy

name: Lexis mom
review: Great product, love that I can have a beautiful lip without reapplying all day.

name: Phinn
review: I expected the color to be a dark mahogany and it applied as a rust. Still nice color, but it didn't "stain" and had no endurance.

name: Laura
review: Great for everyday wear. I bought "Adore", and I love it. Nice sheer color and moisturising. Only complaints: it's not quite the color of the tube (it's more of a golden red. The container is a wine color), and it does not last as long as the regular lip stains. But it's still great.

name: Dani
review: I love these they are so much easier and more convenient to apply than a lipstick and lip liner

name: AvasBeauty
review: I have 4 revlon kissable balm stains and i love all of them!

name: Babs
review: I really like the color.

name: Meg
review: Honey is such a pretty pinky nude shade for perfect "my lips but better" looks. LOVE!

name: Jenna
review: I just got this balm stain in cherish for Christmas and I'm already in love with it!! I have been wearing this almost every single day of the new year, so far, and it has not disappointed me at all!! I'd say the the actual lip stain lasts for about 3-4 hours, but the stain that it leaves lasts all day!! I also like that it's build able, so if you want a brighter color, just add more, if you want a more sheer look, just coat your lips one time!! Best balm stain I have tried, by far!!

name: LK
review: Love this product! Goes on like a lip balm but stays on like a stain. I have had it on for well over 12 hours without having to reapply. I have several colors.

name: G
review: I have purchased 4 in this color alone

name: Jay
review: Stays on through eating and drinking!

name: Kelly M.
review: These are amazing... I have all colors except the nude and orange because I personally don't care for those hues. The color stays better than any other lip color I've tried and its not drying to the lips at all. The color selection is really beautiful.

name: Liz
review: Color did not match the packaging whatsoever. Came in a darker-red tone, but applied as an orangy. Not flattering for me, but may work for others.

name: anonymous
review: It feels smooth and not sticky like a lip balm.

name: sandy
review: long lasting and moisturizing

name: BeautyReviews
review: This really is a stain. I like the minty smell it has. The crayon makes it easy to use. I just wish there were more neutrals besides honey honey and the nude color. I love this though! good for a natural look.

name: Spanish Fly
review: First off, let me start out by saying that I really like this product. It goes on very smoothly, doesn't hone in on any dry skin on my lips, and looks natural. And while the colour selection is, in my opinion, fantastic, they aren't exactly turn out the colour you would expect (in my experience). I bought adore, which is in theory a very lovely colour, but for some reason came out much less dark than I was expecting (the color of the actual crayon-y bit itself doesn't even speak true). Just remember that you might want to test out the color before hand. Other than that, I would buy this again.

name: Karen
review: It goes on smooth and is very moisturizing and smells great.  The color lasts a long time.

name: jillllllly
review: I have gotten so many compliments! I have mine in precious and it is divine! The color goes on a neutral pink and then after about an hour it stains as a gorgeous pinky violet that is just so cheerful and pleasant.

name: Opal
review: I like everything about this product

name: superruffle
review: I do not have any bright lip colors in my collection, but felt I needed to expand my possibilities.  This color is beautiful and brightens my face and my day.  This is easy to apply with a twist up applicator.  There is a peppermint smell and no real taste that I could detect.  It is truly a stain and lasted for a good 6 hours and through meals.  I would say it's slightly drying, but I'm used to wearing glosses all the time.  I put a tiny bit of gloss over it and found it was perfect.

name: ghettojane
review: This product was better than I imagined. I wanted a cranberry color and this was deeper than I thought but it turned out to be exactly what I needed. The application is simple and smooth. It's very moisturizing and it lasts throughout the day. I love this! A new staple!

name: Kris
review: LOVE these! I was skeptical at first because the lip butters really did nothing for me, but these are GREAT! The only complaints for me are wishing there were more colors and that the colors aren't exactly what the tube shows. I found on myself that the color comes out a little deeper than advertised.

name: K Brooks
review: I have always loved using a pencil lip color. I didn't realize this one has soothing, moisturizing properties. Chapped lips be gone! Gorgeous color!

name: Gwy
review:
If you're looking for a stain that lasts for hours, doesn't dry out your lips, and comes in an easy to apply container, this is your lip stain.

I've been looking for a lip stain for years and this is the first that truly lasts for hours, is very pigmented yet can still be combined with other kissable lip stains and actually feels wonderful on my lips. This lip stain is awesome and inexpensive. Go buy it.

name: Jess
review: There is a wide color selection so there is something for everyone.  Not every color will look good on every skin tone, as usual with make up.  There are also day colors, night colors, and transition colors.  My favorite BY FAR is Honey.  It is the PERFECT every day lip color.

name: Rachstones
review: I never use lipstick bc it always comes off or my lips get chapped and dry. This stain is awesome!  It does not come off! You can apply chapstick over it or gloss depending which you prefer.  I even had some light color left the next day!

name: Diana59
review: I use this product daily and really do like it. It does not stay on as much as I wish it would, but I love the way it feels on my lips..

name: shaylapurple16
review: I bought this lipstain in Lovesick about a year ago, and I actually don't have too much of a problem with it. I like that it is like a very pigmented lip balm, but I usually wear it under a pink lipstick rather than on it's own, mostly because I don't think the color payoff is as strong as I would like it to be. That being said, it works really well as just a small pop of color, if that's what you're looking for.

name: Anto
review: Good quality for the price

name: PBro
review: Even though the color of the packaging is not the same as the product, I still love this balm! The color stays long after you've applied

name: Kimmy
review: I like the way it looks

name: Bee Bee
review: I use it simply as a demi matte lip stain.

name: Rachel
review: It takes a few swipes to get good color on these but after that they're great! There is a glossy finish to these at first and then they take on a stain. The stain lasts a long time, about 8 hours for me!

name: Donna
review: This is more coral-red than true red, but it's still very flattering; it's eye-catching without feeling like you're wearing RED LIPSTICK. I love the Balm Stain formula and the minty taste, so this was an unexpected winner.

name: Mj
review: This is my first lip stain make up and it works wonderful. I got the crush color, it is very pretty and have a rich look. I will buy more of this one and also the honey color.

name: Karine
review:
I thought that this product would be great, but I bought it and I was putting it on and the color did not show. So for those ladies that like some color in their lips, this product won't do it. All it is, is moisturizing and a little shimmery, barely-there color.

Trust me.

name: Shorty
review: Natural and moisturizing. Great for everyday use.

name: budget buyer
review: Sometimes when you buy a product it does not match the color shown on label....unbeknownst to me this was VERY true to color shown on label.  Great buy, easy to use and the color is fabulous.

name: ilmatar
review: These are great! They stay on and look more natural than a lipstick. They are easy to use and you can just take them with you when you're on-the-go!

name: the natural look
review: I love it. I bought one for my friend too because I insisted she should try it. I have it in three different colors.

name: Stef
review: Very light weight and easy to apply, have tried more expensive ones from other brands. Does not need sharpner, so it's easy to apply.

name: Em
review: I love how easy this lipgloss stick is to use and the soft pink color. Great product for a reasonable price!

name: Lips
review:
At first it tingled on my lips then it got worse and was painful - washed it off!
Hoping to be able to return it?!

name: Jr.
review: As a college students, I use this to add color without having to reapply constantly. Be sure to moisturize/exfoliate your lips beforehand because it will accentuate peeling lips.

name: teacher_girl
review: I love a great lip stain.  This is NOT it.  Yes, its a stain and it will leave an awkward color on your lips for hours.  But the color becomes a horrific pink (I bought 2 different shades - sweetheart & romantic), just a couple hours after applying.  Romantic (darker shade), I thought might be okay... but again, just after a couple hours it had become a "barbie" pink.  NOT AT ALL the look or color I was wanting or thinking I would have from this product.  The worst part though is that after applying it (carefully and various times on different days in hopes that it might be better this time) the stain "bleeds" out from the edges of your lips, so it ended up looking like I was an idiot incapable of applying lipstick.  If you try this, just be warned that it STAINS and whatever color you put on, it or a shade thereof will be on you for several hours. (ex:  I applied it around 5 pm and even after washing my face and sleeping, it was still noticeable the next morning around 10am) I did like the "balm" part of it... it was definitely more moisturizing than any other lipstain product I've used before.  Still, no way will I wear this stuff again.  This stuff is going back.

name: Emma
review: These stain lips nicely, beautiful colour range. It does have balm properties, just not as hydrating as a regular balm.

name: yowala
review: I thought this might be a more cost effective double for Tarte's lip stain sticks, but alas no.  Tho the color is quite saturated and lasts a decent amount of time, I felt like I was applying a waxy crayon like product and found it drying to my lips.  I will carry it in my purse but it won't be a repeat purchase or my first choice as a go to product.

name: Wifey2Mikey
review: The color wasn't even close to what I expected based on the package.  It has some weird purpl-y tint to it.  It also feels pretty sticky on my lips.

name: Aromatix
review: I have some of the Clinique chubby sticks that are quite similar so I was excited to see Revlon came out with this product. Honestly I prefer the Revlon sticks. They have a pleasant odor and are creamier and more mosturizing that the Clinique sticks. A little pricer than I would like for a lip balm type product but with a coupon they are perfect.

name: Nwara
review: I usually use brand lipsticks and lip stains ... I recently discovered the revlon just bitten balm stain and because they have the offer buy one and get one 50% I got two of them in the colors Cherish and Rendezvous to compare with my Stilla balms. I really love the revlon once more they have strong staying power and very hydrating, the color payoff is great. Specially the price is great comparing to other brands. I defiantly will go back and get more colors I became addicted :)

name: experienced shopper
review: Wears off halfway and looks poor but to bright, and i purchased two colors and i dont care for either.

name: Dawn
review: Not pleased with the product at all and the shipping was horrendous as well 2 of the items i received came damaged

name: Marika the beautiful grayhair
review: Wonderful lipstain.  Keeps color all day.  Needs freshening up after drinking hot liquids.

name: LoveJade22
review: Love this! I don't like lipstick so this is perfect I put the smitten color on then some soft lip chap stick and I'm good to go. However I am naturally tan then I tan on top of it, so the light colors didn't show up at all such as the charm and the light pink color(can't remember the name) so I took those back but smitten and sweetheart LOOK GREAT! I will admit they were a little intimidating at first but over all I love them! You can make them sheer for daily use or dark for a night out use.

name: Cakes
review: I am in love with Revlon lip stains They are absolutely amazing!!! I got 6 colors so far and planning on getting more love them they are very smooth. I love the fact that they actually stay on your lips for a long time. Better thabn tarte! My opinion.

name: KNa
review: I got this in Romantic, which is a classic red and is quite bright, but great for special occasions. Stays on for hours and doesn't dry your lips.

name: shelly
review: After seeing Lovesick in a magazine ad, I had to try these. I LOVE that color and also Honey and Sweetheart. The one that is more red is an unflattering color - that's the only purchase I'm unhappy with. HOney is a great everyday color. True to its description, the color does stay put all day, and it's buildable.

name: Megan
review: I purchased the Revlon Just Bitten Kissable Balm Stain in Rendevous recently to try out something new.  So glad I did because I love the product!  It goes on glossy with a slight sheen to it and stays really well.  The initial gloss fades after a bit and then it stays as a stain on your lips.  It's so lightweight sometimes I feel like I'm not wearing anything then look in the mirror and the color still looks great.  Also it doesn't fade weird as I've noticed with other lipstains.  I also purchased this in Sweetheart and Cherish.  I like layering these with the Super Lustrous nude gloss as well which keeps the glossy look lasting longer.

name: ChiMiku
review: I really like this product. I got it in Honey and Crush and both colors are great. It smells minty which I like and the color stays on all day without needing to reapply while at the same time keeping my lips soft and moisturized. I normally don't like stains because they tend to dry out my lips and highlight cracks and whatnot but this one makes my lips look soft and plush.

name: wi shopper
review: The color was barely noticable... the balm was glossy and long lasting.

name: A
review: This product lasts for hours without needing to reapply. Unlike most stains it is not drying and goes on with a nice even color. Considering it is also a balm, it is not the most moisturizing product but it definitely beats all other stains. I have Crush and Smitten, which look exactly like the color on the packaging and are perfect for a darker and colorful look. I also have Honey which is perfect for a more natural/ everyday look.

name: Dannie
review: really enjoy this version of Revlon's stain.  it's really more like a lipstick, though, which is fine since the 'real' stain tends to highlight chapped areas of lips.  i just hope they come out with some colors that are deeper/darker.

name: Sabz
review: I got it in Rendezvous and the color is a gorgeous orange-coral color. It is more pigmented then my other lipsticks in the same orange color i love this stain.

name: Jayy
review: This is a great every day product that is easy to use and is a good buy. I got my in two colors which were honey and sweetheart. Honey is a very natural pink color that adds a tad bit shine and moisture without over powering your lips. Sweetheart is a little bit dark for me but it's still a nice color when i want a little bit of color to my face.

name: Bodhi
review: I love this product!  It is much more moisturizing than a lip stain - and it really does last all day - even through kissing and eating!

name: Ilikea Alison
review: I love this product! It does wear off gradually over the course of two to four hours but it doesn't smudge. Pleasant minty smell, true to color. What you see on the case is what you get. It also works under lipstick as a makeshift lip liner/primer. But be sure to wear balm under; this stain isn't as drying as others may be but it's still nice to have a base.

name: Ulta Perfumista
review: I had the previous version of the Just Bitten lip stain and was concerned that I wouldn't like this, but no problem -- its even better than the original.

name: marz360
review:
Revlon color stain balms in this subdued apricot, color is the perfect summer shade. Because it is a stain it wears for a long time. Although for me to get the right color pay off, without creasing into my lines, there has to be a lot of product used.
This will stain your lips, but its a good stain with a nice wash of color.

This is a great alternative to the bright pink colors that everyone is wearing, and I think is very wearable for most skin tones.

name: lil_miss_tea
review: I really like the color(s) of this product. I use the shade honey. It is a natural shade of pink, not too dark. The thing I did not like about this product is that it dries up leaving my lips dry. I  am constantly reapplying it. I would recommend this with reservations. Maybe try it with a lip balm over top?

name: Aimee
review: Goes on smoothly, love the chunky shape, and lasts a long time.

name: Happy Customer
review: I discovered these by watching gurus on youtube. I first bought "Honey" and I adore it. It is the best my lips but better color to wear everyday or when I just don't want to think about what will look good, cause that one always looks good! The other day I bought "Rendevous" and I love that one just as much. I wanted an orange lip color but wasn't sure how it would look. This is a great first step and it looks great. It's not so in your face bold but it has just enough color. These have a pleasant minty smell that I like. They do wear off some when you eat but honestly they are so easy to re-apply, I don't even care. The packaging is great, easy to toss in my purse. I don't feel I need a mirror to reapply. They're just awesome and versatile. I want to get more colors too!

name: kaybaync
review: I love this product and this color!  Honey is like a "your lips, but better" color, and it's long-lasting!  It's fantastic- will def. repurchase in other colors!

name: Jersey Girl in NC
review: Will use to moisten lips during the day.  Not suitable for evening wear

name: Livia
review:
This product is my favorite lip color. I use it as blusher as well. Every time I wear it I get compliments from random strangers. Not only is it (Sweetheart) a cheerful shade to see in the mirror before I leave the house, but it's a lift to receive so many compliments when I'm out. People say they love my lipstick, that the color is so pretty, that it looks great on me but they could never pull off that color, and sometimes the compliments extend to my hair and skin while they are at it. When I wear this color, I must become 10 times better looking, because I swear this never happens with any other lip color. Wear it and you'll be more beautiful too. I'm 60, so you don't have to be young for it to work its magic.

I apply it in several layers, blotting in between, and it lasts all day. All I need is to add a bit of plain chapstick in the afternoon to keep my lips from getting dry.

name: LisaAnn
review: Really like how this product applies and keeps lips moisturized.  I picked a color that is terrible for my fair skin (my fault), so I plan to choose a different color next time.

name: Slave to Fashion
review: When I bought this product I expected it to be more like a gloss than anything, but it turned out to be so much more! The color is intense and lasts for hours. After I took it off( this depends on what color you buy, I bought Smitten ) it left me with smooth rosy lips. This is a product I will continue to purchase.

name: LisaE
review: Daily use. I have tried numerous lipstains and have found they cake, fade(except for a tell-tale lip line) and are often unflattering. I bought 4 different colors of this Revlon crayon lipstain, and love all of them. Knowing how cosmetic companies discontinue great products, I will probably buy a few more and store them.

name: blitz girl
review: Like to see more color selections and shimmer shades

name: Aalya
review: When I bought this product in Honey, I was expecting the color to be very natural, and like the color on the packaging. However, when I opened the product, the color of the crayon was a a darker mauvy color. When I tried it on, the color didn't show up at first, but when it dried and stained my lips, it was a brighter pink than expected. I do like the end result, however I feel that this color was really misrepresented. I hope Revlon does something about that.

name: Lanvin Clarke
review: All I can say is I love this Lipbalm so much! And I will buy it again and again... Love the Orange one, so beautiful and stay very long without reapply.

name: niky
review:
I bought them in Crush and Smitten. Both are berry shades. Crush is a vampy purple berry. Smitten is more bright magenta on my skin. I hear that the shades show up differently depending on your skin tone.
The product itself is amazing. I love the colors. I love that they're moisturizing (but do not expect is to smooth out already chapped lips - it's not that heavy duty).
Hope Revlon does not discontinue this product because it is LIGHTYEARS better than the other two stains they've released in the last few years.

name: AngelRose87
review: I am not one to type up reviews on cosmetics, but for this product I'll make an exception. Hands down one of the BEST drugstore balm stains by far!!! When you apply it, your lips are greeted by a very rich and buttery texture. The color (I got 050 Precious because I adore nude lip colors) is just the right tint on my lips. A little re-application may be needed throughout the day/night but it's a large lip product so I don't really mind that. My only complaint is that I didn't buy a second one. Good job Revlon!! I am very impressed and can't wait to try out the other colors. :D

name: tierneymarie
review: I was shocked at how fast and hard I fell in love with this product. I usually find drugstore buys to be cheap in quality, but this stain was exactly what I've been looking for. It was easy to apply, stayed for 6+ hours through eating and drinking with little fading, and didn't transfer or smudge when I kissed my husband and white puppy a mere 60 seconds after applying it. Smitten is a beautiful blue-based hot pink (much lighter than the image would lead you to believe) that looks amazing, even on my super-fair skin; add a swipe of gloss on top and it's perfection. I can't wait to get some more colors!

name: Kayt
review: I purchased the color 'Rendezvous' which is a perfect coral-y color.  I apply clear lip balm first for moisturization, then the Balm Stain and then another coat of clear balm over the top.  This little routine leaves the most natural wash of color and it lasts for quite a long time.  I'd say the color only begins to fade after the 3rd hour which to me is really great considering it is a lip product!  I love this product and will be repurchasing!!  :)

name: blitz girl
review: Would like to see more colors and also some shimmer shades. Sell quickly in store. Need to reorder larger quantities to keep in stock. Obvious buyers favorite product.

name: NoelMaree
review:
I've been searching and searching for a long lasting lip stick or gloss. So many claim to be "18 hours, 24 hours, or all day." And they all wear off after about an hour or an hour and a half at maximum. I was blown away with this product! Not only does it go on like a creamy balm, but it lasts for HOURS through everything!!! The other day I put it on at 3 p.m. and it lasted until 10 p.m.! Even through eating dinner (which was a burger!!!!) I couldn't believe it. I wore it out last weekend and my lips were still a beautiful rosy pink when I woke up, looking, 'just bitten' if you will! :)

The 'balmy' texture doesn't last as long, but the color sure does. Awesome product. Touche Revlon!! I will definitely be going back and purchasing this in additional colors.

name: LG
review: I do wish there were more colors. Some of these come out very bright.

name: Hanna B.
review: This product is so convient, you could stick it in your back pocket, purse, or backpack. It's just that pop of color on that face that brightens your day! :)

name: LeeLee
review: I bought the peach color and it is way too light and chalky looking.

name: HPGIRL55
review: I love these balms, i have them in three colors and i can not get enough! They last forever and i never have to reaply.

name: Lc
review: Great product!!

name: water lover
review: The product doesn't really "stain" your lips like the other Revlon products does.  It came off within an hour and even sooner when drinking.

name: selena
review: I really like this product. I got the honey color thinking it would be a more neutral shade but it's more of a bright pink on so while it's not bad it's not what I was expecting based on the name and label color.

name: Mom on the Go
review: I love this product and plan on getting more in different shades. It is very moisturizing and long-lasting.  The color is perfect and for an evening out I just add some shimmery lipgloss on top of it.  The balm stain feels just like putting on chapstick; it's never dry at all.  Love Love Love It!!

name: Cool
review:
Purchased Color 101 Honey Douce.
Love the color! Looks natural !

name: Lori
review: stays on longer and doesn't make lips dry out as fast as other long wearing lip colors

name: Alli
review: The honey shade is amazing. It is a mauvey neutral that enhances your lips with a slight sheen and natural tint. It feels very moisturizing and lightweight and stays pretty well (ie still some product, but not all, left after eating). I also got sweetheart, which I was surprised how pigmented it is. Sweetheart is a nice shade for a bright, spring/summer pink lip.

name: Twenty four
review: Let's be honest. This isn't a stain. It's a sheer lip gloss in stick form. The consistency is nice - very buttery and moisturizing. And the packaging is convenient- no leaks like you can get with a tube of gloss. But it really doesn't provide the lasting color that a stain provides. Be careful with your color selection, the exterior package color really doesn't represent the true color of the balm. When in doubt, choose a darker color than you think you need. I will continue to use this product, but probably wouldn't purchase again.

name: N/A
review: This lip balm is long lasting, moistuizing and a great color for me. It matches everything. It turns darker after application.

name: Michele
review: I love how easy it is to apply this.  It smells great (minty).  And it does not make my lips feel dry, heavy or cake.

name: Lexo
review: i liked it wish it was more pigmented but it stayed on while i was swimming ;)

name: Lola B
review: Try it you'll like it too

name: Ashley
review: The color looks good. It feels good on my lips. Stays well with drinking. Had to reapply after eating but still wasn't completely gone.

name: Wickednitsch
review: Love the feel of the product and its packaging, but it is next to impossible to find a color you like without buying and opening them all. The package color is very misleading and nowhere near the actual product color.

name: Loveleighgirl
review: Love love love. Easy to apply, not too greasy, and stays on all day.

name: japakwantas
review: I love these balm stains. A swipe gives just a touch of color, but add more and they build into gorgeous color. The case matches the inside color pretty well, and they have no scent and just the tiniest hint of mint flavor. They aren't really moisturizing, but they're not drying either. They don't wipe off easily, especially once they set, so it's good, lasting color. For the price it's unbeatable, too, since they easily work as well as stains that cost twice as much.

name: chelly
review: I am not a lipstick girl. I like gloss, I love balm, but lipstick always seems heavy or sticky to me. I wanted to try something with a bit more color than I used to. I love this stuff!! It glides on like balm, but delivers lots of color from the stain and it shines. Light tatse, can't wait to try more colors.

name: pinkchampagne
review: I pretty much like everything about Revlon's new balm stains except that most of them don't last long. Out of the four that I've tried, only their hot pink Sweetheart shade really stains deeply & lasts for hours. I would still recommend it though, because they're very moisturizing, glossy, and rich in color, and if you're okay with having to reapply every hour or so or after eating, they're great.

name: Adie
review: I bought this to replace my Clinique Chubby and still love my Chubby more.  This isn't super moisturizing, but the color stays on.  I need to apply some sort of chap stick afterwards.  I never had to do this with my Chubby.  Not bad for half the price though.

name: Nebraska Fan
review: This is the first lip stain I've found that really lasts.  It has a nice, natural look.  I can put it on in the morning and it's still on at noon.  Others I've tried were gone within an hour.

name: Som
review: I didn't find this product to be long wearing at all. Perhaps it didn't stain well because I chose a light shade.

name: Singlenthecity
review: these are just like the Tarte lip surgance at a fraction of the price. nice vanilla mint scent I love. I bought all the lighter colors witch look best on my very fair skin tone

name: Janie
review: I got this product in the color Romantic and I was worried that it might be too red. But when I put it on, it was a really natural and sheer tint. It's definitely buildable. It has a slight minty taste which I like but some people might not. It's also pretty moisturizing for a lip stain. But it doesn't really stain my lips, whether or not I have a lip balm on under it. It also wears off really easily for a stain. It's more like a lipstick in that way. But even still, I find it easier to apply than lipstick.

name: Yeranikm
review: Better than the original but still room for improvement

name: Makeup Junkie
review: I absolutely love these - I have only bought two colors so far but both are a daily staple now.  I prefer them to the stain version with the felt tip - this feels more natural.  My only complaint would be the strange menthol smell they have - fortunately it doesn't linger.  My favorite is Darling - it gives a super natural finish.  I also purchased Honey - a little browner than I thought it would be but I still like it.

name: Annie bananie
review: I love playing with lip color, but hate when lipsticks wear off, or other lip stains distribute unevenly. This is THE BEST lip stain I have found. It is creamy and moisturizes, yet lasts.

name: TheReviewer
review: It's a good product. Has pretty decent color selection. I tried Romantic and Adore. Romantic was a little more on the orange side and when it fades it is almost the color of spaghetti sauce on your lips. Not super attractive. But if I'm careful when eating/drinking, it'll last a good couple hours. Love the packaging and the chubby crayon style. Would buy again if it was on sale or if I received it as a gift.

name: Eyeing revlon lip products for a while
review: I was excited to try this product as I've been eyeing them for a while! BUT the color on my lips was orange coral like instead of red. Wasn't happy with product.

name: Great color
review: The perfect and true to color.

name: Tay621
review: I bought two of these a while back and I have to say that while they go on smooth and are very portable, the colours are not true to what colour you are expecting. "Romantic" is still a nice red, although not as bold as I was expecting, but "Charm" (discontinued) was much more orange/coral than the light peachy nude I was expecting. I would say buy these in the store so you can make sure that they will actually be the colour you are expecting.

name: ChelleyDee
review: So I've tried several colors and I prefer the. To regular lipsticks. I'm one of those girls to apply lipstick and then not reapply throughout the day so I knew from the beggining I would something with some staying power. This color, I can put it on the morning and still see it on my lips the next morning. It last that long. It starts out glossy but as it dries you end up with a mostly matte lip. And if the super full color is a little too much you can even put it on lightly for an even sheer was of color. I just wish there were more color options, because I just want them all.... 3 and counting

name: barely there
review: I use this at the office, on weekends and at night.  Great for anytime of day.  Great pigmentation and the stain lasts longer than the glossy part.

name: Meme
review: I have a hard time keeping lip color on because I seem to like my lips or eat it off.  My lips are on the dry side so I find it best to use a moisturizer before applying.  After it's been on a while I can use a lip moisturizer without it coming off.  I can eat a meal and still have color on my lips when finished.  I do wish there were more colors.  This is the only lip color I use because it's the best at staying on.

name: Leeno
review: It was very drying on my lips

name: Yo-mel
review:
The tube is a lovely berry/mauve, but the color is shocking bright pink! Was headed to an out of town interview when I realized that I'd only packed much more dramatic, night appropriate colors, so was looking for a color that would match the tone of my lips, just a hair darker, to give a polished, professional look. A quick web search on the best tinted lip balms (again, I was looking for subtle, not necessarily lipstick) this was one of the products I found. It did go on easily, and may be a better product in another color. Couldn't tell you how long wearing it is, since I took it off so quickly!

Ended up with Covergirl lipperfection color 225 (sorry, name is not on the tube). Much better.

name: Gail the tennis junkie!
review: I love this so much I bought 2 more!!

name: sofly
review: I have been using the honey shade since it was first released a few years back and I refuse to live without it.

name: Brittany
review: This product is great! Matte finish and long lasting!

name: Alli
review: I was so pleasantly surprised by how good this smelled and tasted. It is pretty long lasting (not forever, though, will come off when eating) and looks natural and even. Love!

name: Tif J.
review: I've been looking for a long wear lip product at a good price for a long time. This is the best so far. It has non-drying/clumping, even color that holds up with only slight fading for 10+hrs (though eating seems to shorten the time). I have not tried more costly brands yet but this is by far the best of many at a lower price point.

name: Kristin
review: I use this lipstick day or night. It is a natural shade to wear with anything or it can balance heavily made up eyes for night time!

name: boo07
review: I love easy these are to wear! It feels like a chapstick, but looks like a shiny lipstick. It feels hydrating, almost tingly when you put it on, like a chapstick. The color Rendez-vous is orange, but goes a little pink/coral when it wears off. I don't mind the color change, but I would definitely opt for something more intense if you're looking for a bold, matte color. I love this product, though. I wear it all the time during the day.

name: Don't have a nickname
review: I use this product as a lipstick.

name: Smmk
review: Love the easy pencil design. Goes on smoothly and stays on rather long. Love the natural color. Not too pink or bright.. Well with my skin tone. Great buy! Already want to try another color!

name: yumi
review: i like how this really stays on for hours. the stain that i have been looking for.

name: Murry
review: I thought this lip color was going to be similar to lip stick stain- I was wrong. Instead it's more like chap stick and lip glossy had a baby. The color was beautiful- but very faint. So if you're looking for something bright and loud, this is not the lip stain for you. And I'm not sure you could call it a lip stain? It came off in 30 minutes and got on everything.

name: anniebananie
review: These are nice, the colors aren't quite as nice or deep as I would like, but for the cost, these are good. They also don't really work as balms or anything, just stains. If you can afford any of the higher end lip crayons, go try those out instead.

name: M-square
review: This is a fantastic product! I normally have to use a lip balm prior to applying my lipstick, but not this time. My only negative is that they need MORE color choices!!

name: Jenna
review: Revlon just bitten kissable balm stain is really kissable! Me and my boyfriend love the look and it is great to keep in your purse.

name: Gimme Gimme
review: Great product.  Has good color with staying power and does not dry out your lips.  Most stains are very drying this truly feels like a balm.  Not sticky, plenty of color! Love it! Cant wait to try the other colors! I  like it better than the Clinique Chubby Sticks which had no color power!

name: Ann the makeup junkie
review:
I have these in Honey, Precious, Cherish, and my newest is Sweetheart. My favorites are Honey and Sweetheart. Honey gives a natural and easy to wear lip color for every occasion. It's my go-to if I don't want to think too hard on what to match with the rest of my face make-up. Sweetheart really surprised me! It's very wearable for my NC30 skin and really adds some POP of color to my look.

I would highly recommend trying at least Honey in this collection - it's easy and effortless, just swipe on and go.

The one that actually stains my lips so that it looks like I have lipstick on even 10 hours later is Sweetheart.

name: Daisy
review: I really am enjoying the Revlon Kissable Lip Balm Stains. I own both the shades Honey and Lovesick. They are both gorgeous colors. I do have to add that these balm stains will differ in color on each individual's lips. The Lovesick comes off really bright pink on my lips and the Honey comes off as a baby soft pink. So don't expect the same color pay off to be the same on everybody. Still, they are great lip balm stains. Everyone should try them out because they last all day on the lips, with no need to reapply!!!!

name: merp.
review: This product wasn't as good as others' made it seem! Did not like it that much. Made my lips peal!

name: Noones2444
review: I love the color. I love how long it lasts and how it feels.

name: Stella
review: Bought this once and immediately re-bought this product!  I just love it.  Love the color, staying power, moisture, everything about this stain.

name: Stella
review: Bought it once and returned to buy it again! Just love it! Long lasting, moisturizing and an all around great product.

name: Pam
review: Does not stay on like a stain and is so greasy it runs leaving a stained outline but nothing on the lip

name: Heather
review: This product in the color Honey is my all time favorite lip product. I wear it every day. I've found that if you don't let it set for 15 to 20 minutes it won't stain, but if you don't or rub it off for that time, it stays great. Absolutely adore this product.

name: Dragonfly Lady
review: Very happy

name: LA
review: I was looking for something that would leave some color on my lips (i.e. stain) even after it sort of wore off, but once you eat and wipe your lips, it is gone.  On the upside, it goes on easily and does not dry out my lips like some products.

name: kmp
review: I like that this lip stain is a bit shear and lasts fairly long.  This is my go to lip product.

name: stacey
review: definitely keeps your lip moist and i loved the shine.

name: fat mama
review: Do not apply on dry skin

name: PortlandGirl
review: Love the color "Honey," it's perfect for a natural daytime look.

name: Lyndsey
review: This is an amazing product. I truly love it so much, that it's my go to lip product, it never fails. What I use all the time is the color "romantic." It's such a pretty natural color that you can layer on to intensify the color...it looks really natural and it fades to a "stain" which makes your lips look like they still have lip product on. It's amazing.

name: Kristy
review: I bought this because it was on clearance and I thought I would try something new. I don't remember the last time I wore lipstick before this and now I wear it almost every day!  I didn't realize how very orange it would be and when I saw the container I was pretty shocked-but in this case "not completely true to color" is a great thing! This lipstick gives me a fresh, glowing color that I just love! Besides that, it coats evenly and makes my lips feel really soft.

name: anhimals
review: I would skip this lip stain. Although it was in a easy applicator container, after two hours of wear, my lips were really dry. I even had chapstick underneath my lip stain. I will be returning this lip stain.

name: CurlySue8403
review: Let me start by saying, I love buying lip products, but most of the time I really dislike wearing them unless it's some kind of balm or chapstick. I can't stand things that bleed or are sticky, and because I'm so extremely pale, many lip colors just look overwhelming on my face (especially paired with my red hair). I bought this on a whim. I really wanted to branch out of my neutral lippy safe zone and go for a berry lip this winter, but my lips were also super dry and flaky, despite all the moisturizing and exfoliation products I use. I grabbed the smitten color and I'm in LOVE. Normally stains cling to dry patches on my lips, or worse, bleed/feather after I put them on and then my super pale skin gets stained and I look like a 5 year old put my lipstick on for the better part of a day. This glides on smooth as butter, has a refreshing slightly minty/tingly feel and I found it really moisturizing. I also can put this on in the morning before leaving for the office, drink coffee, eat breakfast and lunch, and drink through the afternoon, and although this will transfer, it doesn't seem to effect the color payoff too much. The first day I wore this I still had some color on my lips when I got home 8+ hours later. It did start to get patchy towards the end of the day, but I finally have an all day lip product that requires minimal touch up and doesn't start to look goofy on me as it wears. I'm really happy with the Smitten shade too it's perfect for all day at the office (nice color payoff without being too much or too dramatic), and I'm sure I'll be picking up more. This is the lippy for those of us who love the look but hate to wear most lip products.

name: Neene
review: I guess I just prefer a gloss or semi-gloss.  This was flat and felt dry.

name: Sammy
review: I love this lip stain in honey, it's such a beautiful mauve shade for everyday. It's a super long lasting with a slight shimmering finish. It goes on super smooth and easy with a pleasant smell. It leaves a beautiful even stain on the lips.

name: Lipsticklover
review: I enjoyed this product a lot because i have very fair skin and this worked perfectly with my skin type, unlike other lipsticks.

name: gbrickey
review: Love it, simple ...looks natural not drying.. it doesn't last a long time but it's an easy reapply.  Very good on the go product I love it a lot more than lipstick! Can't wait to try some of the other colors!

name: Cal in Florida
review: I have loved the Just Bitten lip stains (seems stains are going out of style?!  A shame.), which I add moisture over.  So stain and moisture in one product seemed to make much sense.  However, it almost always looks terrible on me.  My lips are often a little less than smooth despite any external methods to prevent and treat.  Perhaps I'm just aging or dehydrated, but whatever my issue is, the application of this product is unsightly.  The color builds up over any slight imperfection, magnifying it.  And it doesn't last very long, but perhaps that is better because none of my tries are successful.  It's too bad, but I'll just do separate moisture over stain.

name: Allison
review: This is my go-to product if I need a lipstick/lip stain that will last ALL day. It doesn't dry out my lips and leaves a pigmented stain after it wears off. Smitten is my favorite shade.

name: Mimi
review: Opened products should be moved off shelves once discovered

name: El
review: I use this to go to the gym and for regular city walking during the day.

name: Sonia
review: I use it everyday, keeps color on your lips for a few hours and there are so many shades! I love this

name: Moloko
review: It doesn't wear off easily. Moisturising very well.

name: Maryssa
review: Read the great reviews for these and tried it myself. Excellent product! It feels silky and tastes/smells minty! It goes on light or saturated depending on how much you put on, which is nice. Moisturizes well. Just wish it came in more natural colors and less OMG PINK shades.

name: Danielle H.
review: I love that its in between a stain and a gloss. I had tried stains in the past and they were very drying. This is moisturizing with a hint of mint and leaves your lips glossy.

name: Tlovely
review: This product smells great (like peppermint) and the balm stains are also very pigmented which is great in my opinion.  The shade I purchased is Crush and it looks very pretty against my dark brown skintone.  The color is a deep wine color with a hint of shimmer.  I will be purchasing more of the balm stains in the future!  I also love the fact that you can easily apply them without having to really look in the mirror.  The lip balm is also retracable as well no need to sharpen.

name: Monica
review: I like this lip stain/balm. It does pretty well and lasts pretty long. The scent is slightly minty, but not overpowering. I like the price and how easy it is. I am not a typical lipstick wearer and I really enjoy this product.

name: Holly-Laine
review: I have this in the shade honey, which I love. This product has great staying power. Although the moisture does not last, I would not call it "drying". You should know, however, that on my lips, the shade honey darkens to a red, which is a pain to remove, but all in all, I think it's worth it.

name: Lindsay
review: I love these however the color on the tube and of the product isn't always what color you get on your lips, however I have 5 of them and haven't gotten a single color that wasn't wearable.

name: ClassicChic
review: The only thing I don't like is that it's not moisturizing.  I put chap stick on afterwards and that seems to help.

name: Lady J
review: These balm stains by Revlon are fantastic. I got mine in Honey, the color is way prettier on the lips than the container shows. It gives better color coverage than you might think with the title of "balm". I will buy this again in other colors.

name: Di
review: Love my color and staying oower

name: Doggies!
review: Perfect!

name: Valerie
review: awesome color and long lasting tint!

name: Bev
review: Love this! Use as lip liner and lip color. It stays on a long time,

name: Christina
review: I get annoyed with this product because it doesn't stay on and then it fades, in 10 minutes, from the inside out. So you just looked weird with thick lip liner.

name: Grace Face
review: I wear this product often on a daily wear. I love the color and the minty freshness you feel when you apply it on your lips. The only thing I don't like is that your lips become very dry throughout the day.

name: gracie
review: I keep one in my bag and one at home.

name: LIGRAM
review: So happy I purchased this.   It's everything I hoped it would be!!

name: Kim
review: I have purchased this product several times and always go back to it.

name: Whimmy
review: Great color...simple to use

name: Dev
review: I love this lip stain. It works very well and lasts almost all day. I love how is works for day time or night. I don't have any issues with drying all you have to do is apply a moisturizer a couple minutes before for best results.

name: Jurassic World
review: I got mine in Crush and I am so pleased! Remember you do need a lip balm underneath since the product can be a bit drying, but even when my lips were quite dry the product had even, beautiful coverage. My favorite way to wear it is by sheering it out a bit with my finger getting different shades, it's fun to experiment! The product does fade and slightly change color after a while, but nothing drastic. It smells minty, but it's subtle. As someone who hates lip products that smell like ANYTHING I found this to be pleasant and hardly noticeable. (This product also lasts while getting dunked into a pool)

name: Heather
review: I love these lip glosses! They all have a very beautiful color. Only thing I would say is the tube doesn't look anything like the color of the lip gloss. Still they are beautiful colors and a great selection.

name: coldinND
review: Beautiful color. A bit drying and its not long lasting but with a lip gloss it's really nice!

name: JJ
review: These balms really dry my lips out. Stain in the darker ones is awesome though! Not worth it for the lighter ones in my opinion.

name: Kim
review: I LOVE this product!

name: beautylover
review:
This is one of my favorite colors in the kissable balm stain. It is perfect for the fall/winter, and the color stays around a long time even after the initial application of the balm wears off.
Another one of my favorite colors is honey, which is a really nice light everyday wearable color. I also like that they don't dry out my lips like many lipsticks can. And it's super easy to apply!

name: Julie
review: I use this with a clear gloss on top of it. I love it and use it every day at least a few times. It is my favorite lip treatment at this time.

name: Becca
review: I have been dieing to get a clinique chubby stick, or or a boxom lip pencil lipstick, but I don't feel like ordering online. The places to get them are not exactly close by, so i settled for this. I love Revlon, and decided to get this shade in honey. i was not dissapointed. I had to reapply a few times, but once the gloss fades, the color stays.

name: Bree
review: I use these everyday! I love them, have almost every color now.

name: Jess
review: I got the color 'Sweetheart' and its amazing! I wouldn't recommend the color for fair skinned people because it is very bright but on my olive skin it looks amazing, last ALL day long and it's very moisturizing!

name: JLynn
review: I love these. They are true to color, long lasting, and smell like peppermint. I have 4 different colors and I'm definately planning on getting more.

name: Anonymous
review: I bought this lipstain in 'Romantic' not sure of what I was getting myself into. I love to wear red lipsticks but they always wear off so quickly. NOT THIS ONE! I can eat and drink all I want and it won't budge for hours. Once I actually put this on before I went to bed and I still had a faint red tint in the morning. If you want something that stays, this is for you. I wish there was a better color selection, because I know the colors are not really like what you you see in the tube. Mine was pretty close but it was more vibrant than I expected.

name: orangecrush
review: I picked honey, which goes on a natural rosy pink, deeper in color the more times you apply. It really is a stain and yet not drying at all. It lasts about 4 hours for me, which is very good considering nothing else stays at all. One of the things I like best about it is that as it fades it does so without clumping, drying, or creating a goofy ring around my lips. I would love to try this in some of the other colors. I'm hoping they offer a good red for the holidays. I would say it is accurately described as a balm as it does seem to condition my lips, too.

name: Dreamer
review: I like how I don't need to buy a huge sharpener for this. The brighter colors have a longer lasting power then the more nude colors. I have noticed that after a while the color will change.

name: greeneyes 5079
review: I thought this product would be great for work and play - just nice to have a little color.  It made my lips peel and it didn't come close to the color that was projected on the tube...

name: DanielleSheep
review: I use this almost everyday, and can't wait to go buy 4 more colors.  It is moisturizing, yet the color lasts for hours.  Easy to apply too.

name: Morgan
review: I absolutely love this product! I bought Smitten and Rendezvous and both colors are gorgeous - I've gotten plenty of compliments! It makes your lips soft and smooth like a traditional balm, and is easier to apply than regular lipsticks. You do have to reapply for longwear, but I don't mind it. I love that the color is buildable. It's a perfect product for day or night!

name: The pet lover
review: This balm stain is not true to color. I got charming and it turns out super hot pink on my lips. And the stain after looks like I put blood on my lips. Therefore, you have to keep applying it or take it all off. Otherwise, good product. I would buy it again, in all colors.

name: Diana
review: Honey will go on pinkish-brown, then change into a very flattering pink stain that will last hours. It's very moisturizing and pretty perfect. I have light skin with cool undertones and this is one of my most favorite lipsticks. I'm always afraid it will be discontinued, so I've got like 3 back-ups.

name: Kelly
review: This is my first lip stain makeup and it is very pretty. I got the crush color which is dark and have a rich look. I definitely will buy again.

name: Lu Lu
review: Very easy to apply, great color for mature ages.

name: MJ
review: Love this product!

name: Shell
review: Awesome product

name: Colleen G
review: I absolutely loved the Revlon Just Bitten stain & balm duo, but it appears that they were discontinued. I grabbed this due to my prior success with Revlon and was incredibly disappointed. It wears off on absolutely everything. The previous product I used would fade a bit throughout the day and would be reapplied if going out, but it lasted through food & drink, and didn't come off on my boyfriend's cheek when I kissed him. This one has the opposite problem, so I don't think I'll be picking this up again.

name: HeIsTheZissou
review:
I love this product and I own three colors: Adore, Sweetheart, and Honey. Some of the colors are more long lasting than others (Sweetheart will stay on your lips all day and into the next day if not carefully removed), but all of them are moisturizing and easily applied. I lips that are very prone to dryness, and I never have a problem with these. Honey is my favorite by far because it's one of those colors that is "Your Lips but Better". I keep it in my purse all the time and it's easy enough to apply that you don't need a mirror.

I do want to note that 1) they smell/ taste like peppermint (in case that's offensive to anyone) and 2) the colors aren't necessarily true to the tube color, and this is especially true for Honey. I would recommend looking up swatches online prior to purchase.

Overall, I love these an I think they're definitely worth a try.

name: Allie W
review: Is it just me or does the color seem to migrate to the inside of your lips??! Like only stains my inner lip. The part of the lips you actually see has very litter color and the inner rim has all of it. Total waste of money.

name: Boricua
review: I asked my friend what she suggest as a lip color for me. And she said a pink color. She recommended this one and I went and bought it. I love it. I wear it everyday for work and it stays on all day. It may be a little lighter from eating and drinking water but you can still see I have color on my lips. I'm ready to try a new color and have fun with different color lips :)

name: shellybelly
review: This is great, only instead of a truly red color, its a bit orange which really doesn't look good with my skin tone.

name: punkinator
review: use this daily

name: ShortStuff
review: Gives you just a bit of color.  Very natural look.

name: mercadoooo49
review: perfect combo. you get the color of a lip stain, and the hydrating power of a balm. love how you can apply a little and have a bit of color or a lot for more of a pop.

name: Little Princess
review: This is my everyday lipstick. It looks like a lipstick but goes on like a Chapstick. It's moisturizing and comfortable.

name: Val
review: Great product!  Moisturizing and color is great.  Doesn't last all day, but does last awhile.

name: Momo
review:
Feels lightweight
Lasts a bit, not as long as high-end products

name: Melanie
review: I don't usually wear lip color, but I love this stain. I apply a bit to my finger & dab on my lips. It looks natural, youthful, & fresh. It makes my lips look fuller. It is the perfect color for anytime of day. I wish it came in a tub though instead of as a stick. Also, it's not very moisturizing so I like to apply plain chapstick on first.

name: Mishi
review: I love this! I wear it all the time. You can sheer it out for a more natural look or layer it for a deeper color. I will say though that it's a bit brighter than the packing would suggest.

name: rainbowxxraver
review: honey is a good natural color for me. charm is a good pale lip color. these dont sting, despite the minty smell. they do last a good while 3-4 hours with drinking.

name: Drea
review: I really like this lip balm.  It gives great, long lasting color.  The minty feel of the balm is great, I wouldn't recommend this as your only lip moisturizer/balm, I still use a different balm at night.  The color(honey) is a great neutral, everyday color.  It is a bit more mauve than pink but I tend to lead toward darker colors anyway and was taking a risk when buying this color just based on the color of the packaging.  It really does stain your lips but because it is a light color it is not that noticeable. I'm sure the darker colors may leave more of a noticeable stain. Definitely worth the buy, will be buying again and possibly trying other colors.

name: Katherine with a K
review: I found that this color was too bold and bright for my fair skin.

name: trinmn
review: It goes on so smoothly and feels great on your lips!  I am a lip balm aholic but now I use this and get a pretty color along with moisture!!  Love it!!

name: TxsGal
review: Have this in several colors.  Love it!

name: marrockefeller
review:
I use it everyday for any ocassion, I have 3 colors and they all have that minty smell.
it's really nice.

name: Penny
review: These are a great dupe for Clinique Chubby Sticks! The color I bought is Honey, which is great for everyday wear. My only complaint is that they go on smooth initially but within a few minutes feel kind of dry, so I have to put a little Vaseline over the top of them.

name: gg
review: I love this product! My mom was going to get one after she saw it on her friend, and I ended up getting one myself. I love it! I use it daily!

name: Elaine
review: This stays on well and nice color!

name: Rita
review: i love it great feel and wear!

name: Sample girl
review: I absolutely adore this product. It makes my lips feel so soft, smells fantastic and the color is gorgeous. I would recommend this product to everyone!

name: Beck
review: Bought this today because my granddaughter had a dance recital and we were asked to use red lipstick as part of their makeup. One of the sales people at Ulta recommended this product because it stays on so well. After several hours, including dinner, this lip balm was still in place and had excellent color.  It will not be my last purchase!!!

name: Bianca
review: A great lip stain. long lasting, smooth and creamy! looks great under a gloss; only thing is if your lips are very dry use a balm or lip scrub first bc it wont blend well on cracked lips

name: Makeup Newbie
review: I've heard nothing but great things about this lip stain and after purchasing Cherish, I was not disappointed. I am definitely going to purchase a few other colors.

name: candypants
review: This is by far the best lipstain I have used and I have tried them all. I started with rendevous just purchased crush, which is a great berry shade. I love it. These are better than Tarte and Clinique at about half the price. Love, love, love these.

name: Gloss Obsessed
review: I will admit that Honey and Precious are the only really wearable colors BUT this is still an amazing product no matter what colors are wearable and not wearable. I have a feeling that this product is just as good as the Lip Butters. Maybe even better? I know in the future that these colors are going to be tough to get a hold on but it's so worth it!!! It's perfect for going out or a night out. Whether you're the strawberry lip gloss loving 13 yr old or the mother/workaholic, this product is perfect for anyone!!!

name: Tristen
review: Great value and product - wish color selection was wider.

name: Lucy
review: I got the color charm, and it's is the most gorgeous peachy-pink color! I thought it would be too nude, and when you first apply it it looks nude, but after about 1-2 minutes it sets and becomes a peachy color. I love that it is very moisturizing and smells minty! Will definitely be trying other colors!

name: TheMake-upMaven
review: I've always loved the concept of lip stains and long wear lipstick, but hated the way they felt.  This new stain balm is the perfect solution.  The precision of the chubby pencil makes lip liner unnecessary and it has an amazing, light peppermint scent.  The balm feels wonderful and my lips stay soft long after it wears off.  Best of all, my lips stay evenly stained and beautiful between applications.  Love it!

name: Randa
review: So I love this lipstain!! It's so perfect because it feels like chapstick! I think if you buy this, you should definitely buy it at ulta because if you don't like the color you can return it! The packaging is close to the same color, but somewhat deceiving still. And of course the natural color of your lips has an effect on the color for you. I personally have brown hair, pretty fair skin, and blue/green eyes and I got this in "Adore." It is perfect for me, not too bright and not too dark. Its kind of like a dusty rose...but in this case a dusty red, if that makes sense lol More of a deep red! But I love it and it's so cheap in comparison to tarte and better in my opinion!!

name: Dee
review: I really like the colour. I find it lasts a decent amount of time and it fades evenly, leaving a slightly darker stain behind. It doesnt stay too glossy for long but once it losses the gloss look it looks more like a stain. It's not the most moisturizing of balms, but it's not drying either. I have my eye on the colour CHARM, I think I'll get it next. Overall a very good purchase.

name: Fatima
review: These are so much neater than the lip butters. Absolutely in love! After the shine is gone I just apply a lip balm over the stain and it's good as new. I have rendezvous and sweetheart.

name: Jenbatoong
review: Compare to Tarte Lip Surgence, Clinique Chubby Stick Lip Balm, this Revlon Kissable Balm Stain comes in third place. But, I guess, for the price, it is not a fair comparison because Tarte Lip Surgence costs $24, Clinique Chubby Stick cost $15..So I guess, you got what you paid for. The texture, the application, the effectiveness are just like the ordinary lip balm; but just in a more impressive container/case. Compare to Mabeline Lip Balm, I prefer the Mabeline lip Balm over this one.

name: XOBeauty QueenXO
review: I bought two of these, one in cherish and one in romantic. I loveeee the romantic. It's a great shade of red for me (very fair, brunette). I usually have trouble wearing reds because they're too dark for me but this one was perfect. The cherish, on the other hand, was too bright. I've never had that problem with a lipcolor before. But honestly, it made me look like nicki minaj. NOT the look i was aiming for. My biggest gripe with the product is that it isn't as lasting as normal lip stains. Don't get me wrong, it lasted longer than lipsticks, just not what i was expecting. It was worth it for the moisture though. It didn't dry my lips out like every other lipstain out there. So not a bad compromise. I am probably going to end up buying serveral more. Most likely Charm and Adore. Fingers crossed on finding a better pink. Overall though, I am really pleased with the product :)

name: ceccc
review: This product is amazing. I bought 2 (rendezvous & charm) and they both work great. They all have a nice minty smell and just a little tingle. The color stays on your lips all day an you don't have to fumble with reapplying. These are very comparable to the clinique chubby sticks and the tarte lipstains. (i think they're even better.) they also roll up, so you don't have to bother/waste product with sharpening. i would suggest for everyone to get your hands on them!

name: ohemjehnns
review:
I love this product sooo much! I have only three shades: Adore, Romantic and Rendezvous! Rendezvous looks like a crazy orange, but my lips are naturally very mauve-y so it looks like a pretty coral color on my lips (not a clown-orange)! Romantic is a super cute pop of red that I think goes really well with my super fair skin! Adore is a deeper plum-y red which I also love. I think these work so well. As you apply, they are pretty much like a regular lipstick. It will still transfer a LITTLE bit if you drink or eat or kiss for like the first hour or so, but after a while, it will set and there will be a nice stain on your lips! It is NOT like the loreal lipstick (i forgot what those are called) and do not transfer at ALL once they are on your lips. These Revlon stains will still transfer in small amounts, but it is NOT anything like a regular lipstick because these will stain your lips! After most of the balm/lipstick part of it wears out, there will still be a nice stain. You can also reapply and it will still work just as great!
HOWEVER, Ive seen people say that these dont work and dont stain your lips. I think it's a little common sense that the LIGHTER colors will not be as visible in the staining part as the darker colors will be. And this is because our lips are already naturally pigmented, so most likely the lighter colors are not gonna show as visible when they are "stained" on the lips! Try the darker colors, such as the 'darker' pinks, oranges & reds and Im 99% sure you'll be happy with these products!
Also, they have a menthol (minty) smell to them and they apply minty. However, they dont leave a tingly sensation (at least not on my lips) and the mintyness wears off after like a couple minutes.
I have so much to rave about them. Theyre already my new fave lippie!

name: Little Miss Blah Blah
review: I use this product on a daily basis. The only reason why I gave it a 4 instead of a 5 is because it is slightly drying. The great thing about it is that you can layer ANY gloss over it and not lose any of the color. With other stains you had to either use the gloss provided, or none at all. I love the ease of the product, the fact that it is only one tube, and the scent. This is the only product that I do not have an allergic reaction to, or makes my lips peel.

name: Alliy
review: Smells great, and the texture's nice, but it fades quickly, and leaves "the ring" around the mouth. Color isn't true, much brighter than than indcated.

name: Ulta Love
review: This smells like peppermint and has a waxy feel that I didn't enjoy. I wasn't fond of the color I got either.

name: Miranda
review: These are great. They lose their glossy finish after a while but they do stain your lips, which is the point. I like them better than the Tarte Lipsurgence. The one from Tarte that I have is all melty. These actually hold their for, and go on smoothly.

name: kari
review: I didn't know what to expect from this product. I am normally a fan of the marker-style lip stains and just put a balm on top of them once they dry, and wasn't sure if a "balm stain" would actually leave a stain once the balm wore off. I was wrong! I got this in Rendevous and it's great. It's a really pretty, slightly orangey peachy color and looks great with my fair skin. It goes on like a lipstick in crayon form, but feels like a balm once it's on your lips. I left it on for about 3 hours the day I got it, and by the end of the day my lips didn't feel dry, though they didn't feel quite as moisturized as they did when I initially applied it. Also, yes, it did stain my lips! I was not expecting it to work as a stain, so that was a nice surprise. Overall, I will probably be buying a couple more colors, and hope that Revlon expands the color selection further.

name: Sarah
review:
I originally got this product in Sweetheart and Rendevous, but after applying Rendevous once I immediately knew it had to go back. This color looked bright orange on me! I think this had to do partially with my skin tone and lip color, because I know many people really love that color and it looks more coral on them.
