review: I got a pink and it is lovely. Tried a berry color as well and it was just unnatural looking, so took it back.  Love Ulta's return policy.

name: coolgirl1858
review: I really love this product! You can apply once for a lighter everyday color or apply more times for a darker evening look. The only con is that the color fades. It is very moisturizing if you have dry lips.

name: Suzanne, she who doesn't reapply
review:
I bought the honey color, and the more orangey one recently (after seeing how nice it was). I've used Revlon's Just Bitten stain before, and wasn't impressed. But for some reason, this really hits the right mark. I like that it goes on more like a lipstick or balm, but the stain does remain (and EVENLY too, which is an issue I had with the Just Bitten stain/gloss combo thing) even after the "gloss" part wears off. So even though your lips may feel drier, your color is still there. I really appreciate it, as I cannot be bothered to check and reapply all day.

Basically, this has the nice color of the Covergirl stains, but has better staying power and better moisturization. And it's a million times better than the Revlon Just Bitten stain/balm combo things. I'm so happy I found this!

name: Becky
review: I use this all the time and I haven't even had to twist up more product. It's going to last me forever!

name: The Vol
review: This product is great. I have bought several to keep in my purse, pocket, etc. Not only is the product great, the color is fabulous. I use a liner and this together or just the balm by itself. I don't even use any of my other lipsticks any longer.

name: Lulu
review: For all day lip color, like the idea to not have to reapply constantly

name: Scho
review:
The product stains.... The outer lip. I looked like I had on lip liner after 20 minutes.
The color was pretty, but having to scrub it off with a paper towel wasn't entertaing.
Not pleased.

name: DrugstoreDiva
review: I got this in two colors Precious (beige neutral) and Adore (warm red). Precious changed into this weird pink color and got cakey and dried out my lips. Adore on the other hand stayed moist and did not get dry or cakey at all. I based my rating on both the products, but I would give 5 stars just for Adore. Great color, wears well and lasts all day.

name: Emily
review: Originally I started using Revlon's Color Stay Lip Stain + Balm, which I really liked, but then decided to try the Balm Stain.  I am really glad I did.  I like it even better than the original stain!  I purchased this in Sweetheart, Rendezvous, Romantic, and most recently Crush.  Very easy application, surprisingly great color, and doesn't easily come off, but will wear during the day.  Isn't particularly moisturizing but I wasn't really looking for that effect anyway.  Overall amazing!  Will continue to buy in more colors!

name: Vicky
review: In love with it

name: Andrea
review: Really like using this product in the morning on my way to work. Definitely leaves a nice lip stain, but it will rub off a little on a mug or water bottle, so I still prefer the Just Bitten Lip Stain + Balm because that will not rub off at all.

name: Samicakesss
review: I really loved this product. It's perfect for those who want a dark lip but are too afraid to buy a high end brand and not love it. This is affordable and long lasting. You may need to reapply sometimes but it really is a stain. My only problem is I don't like the taste/smell. It has the intense mint taste/smell and I don't like those types of products. It doesn't bother me that much so if that isn't a huge factor to you, then I suggest you get it!

name: Jessi
review: It's extremely bright, therefore hard to wear, but nice for special occassions

name: Angie
review: This product stays on very well.  Does not get pasty!!  Great product!

name: Daryl
review: The color was great with my skin tone. Great for day or nighttime wear.

name: Meee
review: I bought this because I couldn't find the regular lip stains. It looks just like I put concealer over my lips and the color is very uneven. It's not very moisturizing and when my lips are dry it looks absolutely awful, so I have to make sure my lips are totally moisturized and not dry on that day. But it does look good with a lip gloss over it.

name: JennyBean
review: I love this so much. The chubby stick is like Clinique's, which is just so cute! Love the packaging.

name: Lisa the Make-up Junkie
review: LOVED this product!! Applies easily, long lasting- without drying, and a great price! Very similar to the Tarte lip stain, but much more affordable. I purchased 3!

name: Nita
review: I loved the color but it didn't last long after eating.

name: Courtney
review: I've tried a few lip stains in the past and hated how they made me lips look and feel. This is the first and only lip stain that doesn't instantly make me feel like I need chapstick. It goes on and feels more like a lip balm than a lip stain, but it stays on WAY longer than any other lip balm I've ever tried. I will definitely continue buying and using this product, and would recommend it to anyone!

name: country chick
review: I bought this lip stain/balm in "Honey". It has a bit deeper color than the pencil case color, which I like. Goes on smooth, looks natural only better. The color does last a little longer than regular lip balm but certainly not all day.  A really nice feature is that it is a wind-up and not one that has to be sharpened. Wish there was a larger selection of colors. Overall can recommend this lip stain balm. I'll probably buy more.

name: therealbarbie
review: This crayon NEVER gets on my teeth which I have a real problem with.  Never need a mirror and the price is right!

name: Kacee
review: i love this lip stain balm. i bought it in the color honey and it does exactly what it says it will do. the minty tingle is a very much loved effect of this product. i highly recommend!!!

name: GinnygirlNY
review: I tried the Honey stain - I had heard it has a cult following. I love the shade and find it's very natural looking and pretty.

name: msjani
review: I would definitely recommend these affordable and convenient

name: Barb
review: It is smooth and creamy and lasts a long time.  I wish that there were more colors to choose from and that it had more sparkle to it.

name: Jasmine
review:
This really is an amazing balm stain and a great alternative to a regular (super drying) stain. I've found that with normal liquid stains they'll fade in some places on the lips and you can't get it off other parts... It can be frustrating.

But with this balm stain the application goes on so even and it doubles as a lip balm, too. You get color and hydration for hours. I fell asleep wearing this and when I woke up I still had color and my lips weren't chapped at all.

The only slight downside is that you don't get as much color as you would a lipstick. I bought this in 'Adore' and I thought it would be a deeper, more intense red.

The color is still gorgeous but not quite what I was expecting.

name: haileylovesbeauty
review: I saw these on tv and fell in love! i bought sweetheart and i use it on a daily basis!

name: Cindy
review: Just luv how it lasts and lasts and lasts!
